header:
<js>
headers={
	"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 11; V1981A) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/107.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
	"Referer":`${source.getVariable()}`,
"Cookie":"ckc=1;",
}
JSON.stringify(headers)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//本地解密标志位
DEBUG = 0

{{source.bookSourceComment}}

// origin 
origin = source.getVariable()

// aes keys auto update
chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/)
if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) {
  cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1]))
}

// img_array
imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src)
.select(".content-img").toArray()
.map(v=>v.attr("data-r-src"))

if (DEBUG) imgs.splice(1)

imgs.toImg(null,
{headers:{origin:origin}}
	)

</js>

pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1,
    "d+": this.getDate(),
    "H+": this.getHours(),
    "m+": this.getMinutes(),
    "s+": this.getSeconds()
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");

};

<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
    bytes.forEach(a => {
      bt = a & 0xff;
      if (bt < 16) {
        stringBuffer.append("0");
      }
      stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
    });
    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search×tamp="+timestamp+"¶m="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1×tamp="+timestamp+"¶m="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info×tamp=comic/search×tamp="+timestamp+"¶m="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
data = JSON.parse(result).data;
JSON.stringify({
	  "name": String(decode(data.Name)),
	  "author": String(decode(data.Author)),
	  "img": String(data.Img),
	  "desc": String(decode(data.Desc)),
	  "time": String(data.LastTime),
	  "new": String(data.LastChapter),
	  "kind": String(data.CName)+","+String(data.BookStatus),
	})
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
var list = [];
JSON.parse(result).data.BookList.forEach(str=>{
	list.push({
		"Name":decode(str.Name),
		"Author":decode(str.Author),
		"Img":str.Img,
		"CName":decode(str.CName)+","+str.Score+"分",
		"Desc":decode(str.Desc),
		"Id":str.Id
		})
	})
JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$.*

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1,
    "d+": this.getDate(),
    "H+": this.getHours(),
    "m+": this.getMinutes(),
    "s+": this.getSeconds()
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
var list = java.getElements("#detail-list-select li a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href"),
    isVip: i > 9 ? true : false
  });
};
flag == 1
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
